sentences.sContent: He acquainted his classmate with my sister.
sentences.sCn: 他把我妹妹介绍给他的同班同学。

sentences.sContent: I, who am your classmate, can understand you.
sentences.sCn: 我是你的同班同学,能了解你。

sentences.sContent: He acquainted his classmate with my younger brother.
sentences.sCn: 他把我的弟弟介绍给他的同班同学。

trans.tranOther: a member of the same class in a school, college or – in the US – a university
